蝁字的基本解释

蝁
è
毒蛇。

蝁字的汉语字典释义

[①]［è］
［《廣韻》烏各切，入鐸，影。］
毒蛇名。

蝁字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蝁； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1088第11
【唐韻】烏各切【韻會】遏鄂切【正韻】遏各切，?音惡。【說文】虺屬。【爾雅·釋蟲】镻，蝁。【註】大眼最有毒，今淮南人呼蝁子。　又【唐韻古音】烏路切，音堊。義同。

蝁字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
蝁字的起名意思

暂无。

[①] [è]
["Guangyun" Wu Geqi, enter the priest, shadow. ]
The name of the viper.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shenzhen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　蝁; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1088 Page 11
[Tang Yun] Wu Geqie [Rhyme Meeting] To curb Eqie [Zheng Yun] To curb each cut, the sound is evil. [Said the text] is a genus. [Erya·Release insects] 镻, worm. [Note] Big eyes are the most poisonous, and people from Huainan today call the seduce.　[Tang Yun ancient sound] Wulu cut, the sound is chalky. The same meaning.
